stories.description: Developed a Flutter-based meditation application delivering personalized subliminal and ambient experiences with AI-generated affirmations
stories.challenge: A wellness company needed a cross-platform meditation app that could create personalized subliminal experiences. They required an intuitive UI for ambient sound mixing, daily AI-generated affirmations, and offline functionality - all while maintaining high performance across iOS and Android devices.
stories.solution: We built a Flutter-based application with a sophisticated audio engine that allows users to create custom meditation mixes. The app leverages the OpenAI API to generate unique daily affirmations personalized to each sound theme. We implemented a responsive UI with smooth animations and a robust caching system for offline access to content and previously generated quotes.
results: MVP delivered in 1 week with continuous improvement via CI/CD
Cross-platform support across iOS, Android, and web
AI-generated daily affirmations using OpenAI integration
Seamless audio mixing with the Just Audio library
Offline mode with intelligent caching of audio and quotes

stories.project: Shopify AI Diagnostics App for Personalized Haircare
stories.description: Built a Shopify app and theme extension that seamlessly integrates AI-powered hair and scalp diagnostics into e-commerce storefronts
stories.challenge: An AI-powered hair and scalp diagnostics company with 60,000+ B2C users set out to expand into the B2B space. The goal: help e-commerce haircare brands increase customer trust, product relevance, and conversion rates by offering clinically informed diagnostics. They needed a seamless way to let merchants integrate their AI system - without requiring technical expertise from the B2B client.
stories.solution: We built a Shopify app and theme extension that acts as a seamless bridge to their B2B diagnostics API. Merchants can effortlessly add interactive diagnostics, photo uploads, and personalized results to their storefront - all styled to match their brand. The integration delivers real-time diagnostic results without requiring custom development or technical expertise from merchants.
results: Successfully launched on Shopify App Store with native theme integration
Seamless onboarding - install, paste API key, go live
Dynamically configurable styling for diagnostics results, diagnostics modal, and CTAs - no technical expertise required from merchants
Reduced cart abandonment rate, boosted AOV and retention with informed product matching

stories.description: Engineered a mobile-first AI application that delivers personalized beauty and health analysis using a custom ML pipeline, with LLM-powered product advice, affiliate integration, and science-backed recommendations.
stories.challenge: The client wanted to avoid yet another filter-based beauty app and instead build something real - an AI-powered platform rooted in scientific analysis. It needed to analyze user selfies, provide accurate health and beauty insights, and link each recommendation to meaningful research and monetized product suggestions. All of this had to run smoothly across mobile devices and feel engaging on social platforms.
stories.solution: We developed a cross-platform mobile app using Ionic, Capacitor, and Vue. A custom ML pipeline in PyTorch handles face detection, feature extraction, and scoring. The results are fed into a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system powered by OpenAI to pair findings with scientifically supported product recommendations and generate a structured report. The app also integrates affiliate links for monetization, delivering both value and revenue from each analysis.
results: Functional AI-powered MVP delivered in just 2 weeks
Cross-platform support with native performance on iOS, Android, and web
In-house ML ensemble pipeline for facial feature scoring and health indicators
RAG + OpenAI system for scientific product matching and personalized report generation
Affiliate integration for dynamic, monetized skincare and beauty suggestions

stories.project: Telegram Chatbot for B2B Lead Generation
stories.description: Built an end-to-end system for B2B lead generation with referral tracking and CRM integration
stories.challenge: A company with a complex AI-based diagnostics tool wanted to expand their B2B reach. Their goal was to let small businesses onboard easily, allow employees to generate referral codes, and enable end-users to access the diagnostics experience without needing to install an app - all while tracking leads and syncing with their CRM.
stories.solution: We built an end-to-end system that includes a user management platform, a Telegram bot replicating the diagnostics experience, and lead detection logic. The system integrates with their ML-powered diagnostics backend and CRM, enabling real-time lead attribution and automated payouts. End-users can access diagnostics, view results, and get updates - all within Telegram.
results: MVP delivered in 2 weeks
Go-to-market strategy validated within 1 month
Generated profitable leads from day one of launch
24/7 diagnostics access - no app install needed
Lower barrier to adoption in Telegram-heavy markets
Fully automated, scalable lead generation with transparent attribution

stories.description: Created a templateable, reusable LLM integration Python SDK for a singular enterprise company and internal use
stories.challenge: An enterprise client needed to integrate LLMs into their existing internal workflows but was struggling with security, authentication handling, and implementation complexity across different teams.
stories.solution: We developed a templateable, reusable Python SDK specifically for their internal use that handles authentication, security protocols, and standardized integration patterns.
results: Significant reduction in integration time for internal teams
Enhanced security and authentication handling
Standardized LLM implementation across departments
Simplified internal adoption
